channel.title: DevBox-Santé – Communication
channel.description: Recent content in Communication on DevBox-Santé

item.title: Communication: DevBox-Santé 6 is released !
item.description:
The DevBox-Santé 6 is finally here!

The major new features are:

  • Updated documentation: https://doc.devbox-sante.fr/6.x/
  • A technical migration from Java 11 to Java 21 and from Spring Boot 2 to Spring Boot 3
  • A new DMP approval now compatible with version 2.9.1: https://doc.devbox-sante.fr/6.x/connecteurs/dmp/versions/#version---601-05122024
  • Support for the AIR mode: https://doc.devbox-sante.fr/6.x/connecteurs/dmp/authentifications/indirecte_renforce/ An agent enabling the instant launch of CPS and health card reader components: https://doc.devbox-sante.fr/6.x/installation/agent/
  • A shared Docker image for all our clients:
  • And likely more surprises…

The process for accessing the new Docker images has changed. A specific communication on this topic will follow.
